comments.comment: Cardinal, we are a secular society, if not let us be one in future. Just limit yourself to work of God if he ever exists as you are proving day after day that He doesn‚Äôt. Most of all you are proving that you are a Rajapakse supporter. This is sucking and damaging the innocent Christian population of Sri Lanka as well as creating a division and confusion to all Sri Lankans.
